project_abstract.cdata: The River Transport Project, be carried out over a two-year period, includes (a) the rehabilitation of navigational aids and dredging facilities and equipment in the Congo River estuary; (b) the improvement of navigation on the Kinshasa-Port-Francqui waterway; (c) the rehabilitation of OTRACO's river fleet; (d) the provision of experts to fill key positions in OTRACO and the two Regies; and (e) the study of the Voie Nationale.
